query:
SELECT
                    b.id,
                    b.name,
                    b.description,
                    b.level_id,
                    b.created_at,
                    b.updated_at,
                    COUNT(u.id) as "student_count!"
                FROM branches b
                LEFT JOIN users u ON u.branch_id = b.id AND u.role = 'student'
                WHERE b.level_id = $1
                GROUP BY b.id
                ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
                LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
